scripts.build-release: (rmdir /S /Q dist || echo continue) && tsc -p . --outDir dist && copy package.json dist && copy bower.json dist
scripts.prerelease: npm run build-release && cd dist && git init && git remote add origin %npm_package_homepage% && git fetch --update-head-ok --depth=1 origin release && git branch --track release origin/release && git symbolic-ref HEAD refs/heads/release && git reset
scripts.release: cd dist && git add * && git commit -m "Release %npm_package_version%" && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push origin release && git push --tags
